data.message:
Feminem. The real slim shady died a few albums back. Please dont stand up, just sit down, your too old, go home. A sellout, a fraud, a phony, sucking mainstream dick everytime someone says "blow me". 
Have another crank with jimmy kimmel, pump some estrogen, spew some more drivel.

Nobody said women, as a rule, are inferior in any way at all.
